title: I got perma banned
body: I got perma banned on my account. I know I was very toxic, but my team got my very pissed off. I know i could've behaved way better. I am young and have bad temper problems. Riot I am sorry for what i have done. If there is ANY way i can get my account back. I would do annnything. I have spent so much money on it and am youn and foolish. Once again I am so sorry for what I did.

replies.body:
The thing to remember about perma-bans is that they are rarely - if ever - issued due to a single event (or even a single case). Riot's current punishment system operates on tiered structure, with escalating punishments based on *how often* you've been punished previously. The scale looks something like this:

* 10-game chat restriction
* 25-game chat restriction
* 14-day time ban
* perma-ban

Within this system, you were given multiple opportunities to bring your behavior into line. Your failure to do so is the primary factor in this ban.

Unfortunately unless it was due to a mistake, riot is not going to unban a banned account. We know that your heart's hurting over it, but to be frank the only thing you can do now is start over, make new account, and be more careful with what you do with it - especially if you decide to invest in it.

Instead of lingering on your ban, take the time to think about not just what you did, but why you did it and how you can work towards not doing it in the future.

You may not be able to get back what you lost, but you can prevent yourself from losing anything more.
